query.value: select o.ID, o.CUSTOMER_ID, o.DATE_ORDERED, o.DATE_SHIPPED, o.TOTAL, o.ORDER_FILLED, 'N' as SLICED, (o.DATE_SHIPPED - o.DATE_ORDERED) as timeToShip, avg(TOTAL) over (PARTITION by o.customer_id) as orderAverage from S_ORD o where o.CUSTOMER_ID=:customer_id and (o.DATE_SHIPPED - o.DATE_ORDERED) is not null order by o.DATE_ORDERED

select c.ID,c.NAME,c.PHONE,c.ADDRESS,c.CITY,c.STATE,c.COUNTRY_ID,c.ZIP_CODE,r.CREDIT_RATING,c.CREDIT_RATING_ID, c.SALES_REP_ID,e.LAST_NAME,c.COMMENTS from S_CUSTOMER c LEFT OUTER JOIN S_CREDIT_RATING r ON c.CREDIT_RATING_ID=r.ID LEFT JOIN S_EMP e ON c.SALES_REP_ID = e.id where c.COUNTRY_ID=:countryID and c.ID=:customerID
select PRODUCT_ID, WAREHOUSE_ID, AMOUNT_IN_STOCK, w.ADDRESS, w.CITY from S_INVENTORY i join S_WAREHOUSE w on i.warehouse_id=w.id and i.product_id=:product_id
select customer_id ,avg(total) as average from S_ORD WHERE CUSTOMER_ID=:customer_id group by CUSTOMER_ID
select ID,COUNTRY_ID,NAME,CITY,SALES_REP_ID from S_CUSTOMER where (CITY like :city) AND (NAME like :name)
select ID as country_id, COUNTRY_CODE as code, ID||'-'||COUNTRY as idname, 'Bold' as fontStyle, 'apps/meridianDemo/images/flags/'||COUNTRY||'.png' as iconPath from S_COUNTRIES order by country_id

select ID||'-'||NAME as idname, ID as code, COUNTRY_ID AS country, 'Italic' as fontStyle, md_auxnavigation.leaf as nodeState, 'apps/meridianDemo/images/leaf.png' as iconPath from S_CUSTOMER where country_id = :countryID order by name

select ID||'-'||NAME as idname, ID as code, COUNTRY_ID AS country, 'Italic' as fontStyle, md_auxnavigation.leaf as nodeState, 'apps/meridianDemo/images/leaf.png' as iconPath from S_CUSTOMER where sales_rep_id = :salesRepID order by code
select ID as emp_id, USERID as code, ID||'-'||first_name||' '||last_name as idname, 'Bold' as fontStyle, 'apps/meridianDemo/images/folder.jpg' as iconPath from S_EMP where title_id=2 order by emp_id

dataSourceDef.description: this is the main query for the tree created in the panel aux_sMNavTreeBrowse
dataSourceDef.name: aux_navigationTree

query.value: select 'Customers' as idname, 'COUNTRIES' as code, 'Bold' as fontStyle, md_auxnavigation.collapsed as nodeState, 'List of Countries' as tooltip, '' as iconPath from dual

textLabel.label: Display Output here by calling sb.print(string)

domain.description: Default lang domain for multilingual keys
domain.name: lang
